definitions: in a way that relates to the theory of a subject or area of study rather than its practical application

examples.text: the method has been studied theoretically

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to theory of subject or area of study rather than its practical application

definitions: according to theory rather than experience or practice

examples.text: this scenario is theoretically possible, but not very likely
the internet, at least theoretically, is infinite

shortDefinitions: according to theory rather than experience or practice
